## Descriptive Statistics 

This is an R Markdown document used to showcase an example of **Chicken Weight Analysis**.  


```{r libraries, echo=FALSE, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(DT)
```
```{r chicwt, echo=FALSE}
datatable(chickwts %>% 
             group_by(feed) %>% 
              summarise(n = length(feed),
                        Average = mean(weight),
                        SD = sd(weight)),
           options = list(
  pageLength = 10,
  lengthMenu = c(5, 10, 15, 20)
))
```

## Plots


```{r boxplot, echo=FALSE}
boxplot(weight~feed,
        data = chickwts)
```
```{r scatterplot, echo=FALSE}
plot.default(chickwts$feed,chickwts$weight,'p')
```


## Inferential Statistics 

The one-way ANOVA summary:
```{r anova, echo=FALSE}
chick_lm <- lm(weight ~ feed, data = chickwts)
chick_aov <- anova(chick_lm)
datatable(chick_aov,
          options = list(dom = 't', ordering=FALSE))
```
